attributes.action: Support the Sprotbrough Cafe & Wine Bar
attributes.additional_details:
Planning Application reference: 13/02321/FUL

Alcohol & Music Licence Application: WK213029654

This is a petition in favour of the proposal set out to open a Cafe & Wine Bar situated at Unit 8 Main Street, Sprotbrough, Doncaster. The feed back from all but a few residents is so positive that we felt a petition would help show this support to the people that matter the Local Government. Please e-sign the petition if you are in favour of the Cafe & Wine Bar opening in Sprotbrough, we cannot do it without your support.
